description: As an intern, I was given a series of training activities, including creating a chatbot using a third-party large language model (LLM), implementing a clinic tracker using the Google Maps API, and containerizing the built application using Docker, followed by deployment on Amazon Web Services (AWS). Additionally, I was tasked with integrating unstructured data into an existing database, for which I utilized Python.

company: Bureau of Fire Protection Region VII Office
description: I developed a local web system to manage the records of certificates for the Bureau of Fire Protection. For this project, I used the Laravel framework for the development of the system and MySQL as the database.
